mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName}( id, data_id, task_id, customer_order_id, phone, sms_content, sms_type, pay_count, user_id, phone_type, area_code, pay_type, pay_status, pay_time, push_flag, send_status, channel_code, sp_number, send_datetime, company_id, submit_mode, topic, msgid, create_datetime, update_datetime, report_gateway_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{dataId}, #{taskId}, #{customerOrderId}, #{phone}, #{smsContent}, #{smsType}, #{payCount}, #{userId}, #{phoneType}, #{areaCode}, #{payType}, #{payStatus}, #{payTime}, #{pushFlag}, #{sendStatus}, #{channelCode}, #{spNumber}, #{sendDatetime}, #{companyId}, #{submitMode}, #{topic}, #{msgid}, NOW(), NOW(), #{reportGatewayId} )
INSERT INTO ${tableName}( bizid, taskid, result, createtime ) VALUES ( #{bizid}, #{taskid}, #{result}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tableName} SET report_status=(CASE WHEN report_status='T100' THEN 'T100' ELSE #{reportStatus} END) WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id id from jmsg_sms_send a LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON a.user_id = u1.id WHERE a.phone=#{destTermID} AND a.channel_code=#{gateWayID} ORDER BY a.id DESC LIMIT 1

select id AS "id", task_id AS "taskId", customer_order_id AS "customerOrderId", phone AS "phone", sms_content AS "smsContent", user_id AS "userId", pay_type AS "payType", push_flag AS "pushFlag", channel_code AS "channelCode", topic AS "topic", sp_number AS "spNumber", report_gateway_id AS "reportGatewayId" from ${tableName} where send_status REGEXP '[T]+.*' AND phone=#{data.destTermID} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tableName} SET submit_time = #{submitTime}, report_status = '0' WHERE id = #{id}
